display_long_description:
**Physics-fueled games with friends**

Hello there. I assume you’re here to learn more about Banter. Well, SideQuest made a Social VR game. With excellent physics in it. So, go ahead and click ‘more…’ to learn more. See it down there in blue? Isn’t that meta?


**The best physics in Social VR**

Harness cutting-edge FlexaPhysics ™️ (made with ♥️by Nimso) and bend gravity to your will. Or get rid of it entirely. Who needs gravity, anyway?
[media]


**Be who you want to be**

Pick from Ready Player Me or a **fully custom avatar**. Import your creations from Blender to really own your look. 
[media]

**Banter’s better together**

Meet friends and make new ones at Banter’s regular hangouts, meetups, movie nights, karaoke-thons, and more. It’s called Social VR for a reason. 
[media]


**Get your game on—and push that tush**

From Ski Jump to Tush Push, challenge your pals on the Banter leaderboards. Can you become the number one number two? 💩
[media]

**Share in the adventure**

Portal across the Banter-verse and explore thousands of community-created worlds. Can you survive the Banter Backrooms…?
If you build it, they will come…
Build worlds, make games, host events, and share it all with the Banter community. Go on… Flap your wings like a little social butterfly. 
[media]

**Slam your body down and wind it all around**

Or don’t… Either way, you’ve got options for full-body motion tracking.
[media]


**Join the Banter**

Banter is free to play—and always will be. Welcome to our worlds!


**You might find these useful…**


**Website**: bantervr.com

**Discord**: discord.com/invite/bantaverse
